programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In pursuit of the first of her three Toronto titles, Serena Williams came across serial winner Monica Seles, a four-time winner in her own right, in the 2001 semi-finals.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Roaring back from long-term injury, former champion Kim Clijsters would meet top seed and world number one Lindsay Davenport in the 2005 Indian Wells final.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Andy Murray, the defending champion, and Novak Djokovic - meeting for the first time since the 2012 US Open final - went back and forth across three thrilling sets for the Shanghai title.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Clinching the fifth of her eight Miami Open titles, Serena Williams would have to overcome one of her great rivals Justine Henin as the pair met in a highly anticipated 2007 final.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Saving four match points in the process, Roger Federer was pushed to the limit in his 2014 ATP Finals semi-final meeting with fellow Swiss superstar Stan Wawrinka.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a three-hour test of wills, Justine Henin was bidding to close an up-and-down year with the defence of her WTA Finals title against Maria Sharapova in 2007.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a match that would decide the 2016 year-end world number one, Andy Murray - looking to cap a storybook season at The O2 in London - met rival Novak Djokovic at the ATP Finals.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Adding the Doha title to her successful Australian Open defence, Victoria Azarenka kept Serena Williams at bay as the top two seeds served up a memorable final in 2013.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: A US Open finalist one month prior, Caroline Wozniacki's 2014 WTA Finals campaign got underway against then world number two Maria Sharapova in Singapore.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: The China Open climax sees Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz get set for a second final meeting. Sinner aims to defend the crown, while Alcaraz looks to avenge last year's defeat.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras met in the 2001 Indian Wells final - one of 34 career meetings. Agassi eyed a second consecutive win over Sampras in their first meeting in over a year.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In the 1996 Indian Wells final, Steffi Graf - having made her competitive return after a four-month injury layoff - would compete with Spain's Conchita Martinez for the title.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a battle of generations, two of the all-time greats Roger Federer and Andre Agassi fought for the year-end championship in 2003. Federer was aiming for his first title on American soil.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Meeting for the first time in a final at tour level, the Williams sisters Venus and Serena went toe to toe in an emotionally charged contest for the Miami Open title.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In their first ever match in what would become a trophy-laden rivalry, Roger Federer - the then world number one - encountered Rafael Nadal in the third round of the 2004 Miami Open.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In the match that resulted in Serena Williams' 14-year boycott of Indian Wells, the then 19-year-old fought Kim Clijsters in front of a volatile crowd - ultimately clinching her second titl

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In a five-hour, five-set Rome Open epic, an 18-year-old Rafael Nadal lit up the Foro Italico in his back-and-forth contest with Argentina's Guillermo Coria.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: In pursuit of the first of her three Toronto titles, Serena Williams came across serial winner Monica Seles, a four-time winner in her own right, in the 2001 semi-finals.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: The budding Rafael Nadal-Roger Federer rivalry comes to a boil as the iconic pair went head to head in the 2006 Rome Masters final. Nadal had won four of their first five meetings.

programme.title: ATP/WTA Tour Classic Matches
programme.desc: Roaring back from long-term injury, former champion Kim Clijsters would meet top seed and world number one Lindsay Davenport in the 2005 Indian Wells final.

programme.title: Best Of The WTA Finals
programme.desc: Off to a winning WTA Finals start, the year-end world number one Aryna Sabalenka faces Jessica Pegula in a 2024 US Open final rematch. Pegula also got underway in Riyadh with a win. (04.11)

programme.title: Best Of The WTA Finals

programme.title: Best Of The WTA Finals

programme.title: NFL Sunday GM2 Highlights
programme.desc: Home and dry in the race for the NFL playoffs, the Denver Broncos are in the box seat for the number one seed as Trevor Lawrence and the 10-4 Jacksonville Jaguars come next. (21.12)

programme.title: NFL Bengals @ Dolphins Highlights
programme.desc: Lamar Jackson and the Ravens, chasing a third straight AFC North crown, play the Patriots. Despite defeat to the Bills, New England remain well placed to clinch the AFC East title. (21.12)

programme.title: PL Greatest Liverpool/Arsenal 2004
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Liverpool take on Arsenal back in 2004 at Anfield in a match that saw some late, late drama.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Leics/Everton'16
programme.desc: Relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Leicester City celebrate their iconic Premier League title triumph in style as they host Everton at the King Power Stadium in May 2016.

programme.title: PL Greatest:N Forest/Liverpool '92
programme.desc: Relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Nottingham Forest met Liverpool on the opening weekend of the inaugural Premier League season in 1992, in Sky Sports' first Premier League game.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man Utd/Liverpool '09
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Manchester United host rivals Liverpool at Old Trafford back in 2009 in a match that saw five goals.

programme.title: PDC Classics 2023
programme.desc: Revisit Phil Taylor's fourth World Championship victory, achieved at the 1996 PDC World Championship in victory over rival Dennis Priestley. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Wade v Thornton: Wld Grand Prix 14
programme.desc: Revisit an incredible match at the 2014 World Grand Prix of Darts, as James Wade and Robert Thornton both hit nine-darters during their round two meeting. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Bristow v Taylor: WDC SF 1997
programme.desc: Revisit a semi-final from the 1997 World Darts Championship that pitted Eric Bristow, who was enjoying one of his greatest runs in the PDC, up against Phil Taylor. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: MVG v Wade: Premier Lge 2015
programme.desc: Revisit a classic Premier League Darts contest from the Motorpoint Arena where Michael Van Gerwen dismantled James Wade in 2015 with an average of 116.90. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Sheff Weds v Newcastle
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Sheffield Wednesday take on Newcastle United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship, with both sides looking for promotion chances.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Fulham v Aston Villa
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. In this episode, Fulham looked to maintain their playoff hopes against Aston Villa in the Sky Bet Championship in April 2017.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: N. Forest v Ipswich
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Nottingham Forest look to avoid relegation from the Sky Bet Championship as they face Ipswich Town in May 2017.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Brentford v Swindon
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. Here, Brentford face Swindon Town in May 2013 in the League 1 semi final at Griffin Park.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Danish Golf Championship, a DP World Tour event taking place at Fures Golf Klub in Copenhagen. Frenchman Frederic Lacroix returns to defend the title.

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Women's Scottish Open, a Ladies European Tour event held at Dundonald Links on the Ayrshire coast. This year's field boasts 13 Major champions.

programme.title: Chronicles Of A Champion Golfer Rory McIlroy
programme.desc: A look at one of The Open's champions, Rory McIlroy. From Northern Ireland, McIlroy dreamed of winning The Open, a feat he achieved in 2014 with victory at Royal Liverpool.

programme.title: F1 2025 Season Recap
programme.desc: It's lights out at the Hungaroring. As Charles Leclerc goes up against the McLarens from pole, both Max Verstappen and Lewis Hamilton face tough recovery drives from further back. (03.08)

programme.title: F1 2025 Season Recap
programme.desc: It's lights out in Zandvoort. Pipping his team mate to pole, Oscar Piastri leads Lando Norris as Max Verstappen looks to spring a surprise from P3 with Isack Hadjar for company. (31.08)

programme.title: F1 2025 Season Recap

programme.title: Top Gear: Burma Special
programme.desc: The lads are on a mission to build a bridge over the River Kwai, but first they must drive across Burma - a nation largely closed to Westerners - in three rickety lorries!

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The not-so-wise Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on an action-packed road trip as they try to follow the path of the Three Wise Men across the Middle East.

programme.title: Top Gear: Bolivia Special
programme.desc: The boys are dropped deep into the Bolivian rainforest armed only with three 4x4s. They must drive all the way to the Chilean coast - via drug lords and debilitating altitude.

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse: Gone Christmas Fishing (2022)
programme.desc: Bob and Paul travel to the northern islands of Norway on an extreme fishing adventure as they face the mighty maelstrom where tides collide and big fish await.

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob fly to Enniskillen to fish for the Pike which eluded them in series one. They discuss their respective bad habits and Bob gives Paul a thorough health update.

programme.title: Mortimer & Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob fish on the River Ure. They meet the surgeon who performed Bob's life-saving heart bypass and re-enact all the drama of the operating table.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The fun-packed petrolhead show hosted by Jeremy Clarkson and co. The chaps try to prove that a fly-drive holiday to Florida is more fun if you buy a car rather than rent one.

programme.title: Top Gear: India Special

programme.title: Would I Lie To You?

programme.title: Would I Lie To You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon joins regulars David Mitchell and Lee Mack for the scheming panel show. Janet Street-Porter, Omid Djalili, Dave Gorman and Davina McCall are the guest fibbers.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You

programme.desc: Superlative satire from back when we were still in Europe and Donald Trump was a mere presidential hopeful! With guests Nish Kumar, Tiff Stevenson and Josh Widdicombe.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Saving A Gem. The crew finds a gem with a log cabin tucked inside an old farmhouse, but they struggle to disassemble and demolish the property due to the ever-increasing mud. S9, Ep11

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Taylor Family Farm. The team heads to Yorktown to pick through an old farm and former Native American settlement. Mike and Tay handle the heavy lifting outside to save a steel boat. S9, Ep12

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Fickle Fortune. Halfway through the season, Shawn needs massive gold at the Bluff or his empire faces ruin. After the debacle at Sledge Island, Zeke and Emily reach breaking point. S6, Ep5

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Reaper Madness. Keen to reverse his fortunes, Zeke starts a perilous solo dive. The Kellys risk a 13-mile trip in their rinky-dink dredge and George wants to prove his mining mettle. S6, Ep6

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Winter storms ravage the Gold Retrievers' new $35,000 dry blower and could end their season. Meanwhile, the pressure to find gold could tear the Ferals apart. S7, Ep5

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Deep
programme.desc: Escobar's Treasure Sub. Jeremy explores an incredible underwater discovery in the Arctic. Plus, he reveals details of a high-speed chase between a narco sub and the US Coast Guard. S1, Ep6

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Everything Changes. The Cornelia crew fights to save their gear from sea ice. As a pandemic looms, Russian boats vanish and captains race to dock before crab prices crash. S16, Ep23

programme.title: Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Into The Mormon Eye. The team tries a dangerous manoeuvre on the trail of the Lost Rhoades Mine to access the Mormon Eye cave. Duane finds more poacher sites on the ranch. S3, Ep5

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: America's Lost Flight. Josh Gates investigates the most mysterious airline disaster in American history. He searches for answers to why Northwest Flight 2501 vanished. S6, Ep15

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Marine Salvage. Mike and Robert head to Florida and get lessons in diving and safety so they can salvage under water. They recover old ship parts from the bottom of the ocean. S9, Ep13

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Sweet Homestead Alabama. For families moving entirely off-grid, the learning curve is steep. To save their homesteads, they call in survival experts to prepare them for the worst. S4, Ep3

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Cave-Ins And Explosions. With the end of the season approaching, the rookies risk cave-ins at their abandoned mine claim. Deep underground, George is trapped in the blast zone. S1, Ep7

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Aerial Opal Spotting. The mining season is almost over and Col's crew take one last gamble. The Cooke brothers strive to save their mega opal machine and disastrous season. S1, Ep8

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: New Blood. Two new skippers join the veteran fleet to take on the treacherous Bering Sea, but when they invade the Wizard's crab grounds a bigger battle is on. Who will be victorious? S7, Ep1

programme.title: Jack Osbourne's Night Of Terror: Bigfoot
programme.desc: Jack Osbourne and Jason Mewes have questioned the existence of Bigfoot for years. Now, they venture deep into the woods of Idaho to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Gypsies strike a patch of gold but are distracted when thieves raid their nearby lease. Meanwhile, torrential rain disrupts production for the Dirt Dogs. S4, Ep4

programme.title: Naked And Afraid: Alone
programme.desc: Alone: Max Pushed To The Max. Constantly on the run to avoid territorial rhinos, elephants and lions, survivalist Max takes on the punishing African Savannah. S1, Ep5

programme.title: Naked And Afraid: Alone
programme.desc: Alone: Bugging Out. In the darkness of the Belize jungle, Kim Kelly is surrounded only by torrential downpours, infuriating ticks, and howler monkeys. S1, Ep6

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Hillstrand's Last Catch. Two old friends race to finish their seasons. Johnathan Hillstrand wants to bid farewell in a blaze of glory, but the Bering Sea may have other plans. S13, Ep17

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Lost At Sea. The Coast Guard scours the Bering Sea for a missing crab vessel, while the fleet awaits news on fate of its crew. After a plea from his wife, Sig ponders an early exit. S13, Ep18

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Last Damn Arctic Storm. After the Destination tragedy one last storm hits Edgar, Bill, Sean and Jake. The Coast Guard fear the worst for another fishing vessel as it takes on water. S13, Ep19

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: The crews of the Northwestern, Seabrooke, Time Bandit, Wizard, Kodiak and Ramblin' Rose return to the perilous, icy waters of the Bering Sea for more hardcore crab fishing. S14, Ep1

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen are desperate for a breakthrough after a run of bad luck. And the Young Guns are under financial strain and fall out over their new mine. S3, Ep8

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Tunnel Rats are under extra pressure as rival miners close in on their claim. And, the Bushmen must brave an abandoned mine to remove a dead animal. S3, Ep9

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen confront a miner who has illegally dug their claim. The Young Guns must find a new source of opal when poisonous fumes force them to abandon their mine. S3, Ep10

programme.title: Gem Hunters Down Under
programme.desc: New Opportunities. Old Timer, Ray, and his best mate Paul set foot on a new claim for the first time. The Apprentices begin connecting two mine shafts via an underground drive. S2, Ep1

programme.title: Gem Hunters Down Under
programme.desc: Lady Luck? After a run of bad fortune, the Bushies are back digging on Max's claim. The Richardsons return to a long-forgotten claim and decide if it's worth reopening. S2, Ep2

programme.title: Gem Hunters Down Under
programme.desc: Breaking Through. After missing the mark to connect their shafts underground, the Mifsuds call on their kids for help. Ray finally gets decent sapphires out of his new claim. S2, Ep3

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: As bushland miners The Dirt Dogs encounter a possible find of a lifetime, Henri and Kellie battle brutal weather and each other. And the Gold Gypsies strike a deadly threat. S2, Ep6

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: On their remote Jackson site, the Dirt Dogs gamble their season on a risky plan, and some uninvited guests are caught red-handed. Meanwhile, Ted and Lecky uncover a huge find. S2, Ep7

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Ted and Lecky unearth an ancient mystery that could lead to a hidden treasure trove as the Gold Gypsies fight for survival. Meanwhile, Henri and Kellie are running out of supplies. S2, Ep8

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: This Is Unreal. Milton deals with the loss of his mother by shopping to excess, and cancer sufferer Louise's health problems are exacerbated by her hoarding habit. S4, Ep4

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Just Tear It Down. Darlene and Doug's home is packed with junk. Due to an overflowing and leaking septic tank, the city council is threatening with eviction. S4, Ep5

programme.title: Yeti Massacre

programme.desc: Will's Dilemma: Simon and his new girlfriend Tara double date with Will and Tara's friend Kerry, but Will wonders if it's worth spending time with a girl he finds boring.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The Trip to Warwick: Simon and his new girlfriend Tara are going on a trip to visit her sister at university, and the other boys decide to invite themselves along.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will Is Home Alone: Will's mum goes on a weekend away with an old friend. Will is left home alone and the boys take advantage of the situation. It's all fun until the morning.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: The Camping Trip: Will draws on his scouting experience to cope with the last trip he's organised for the boys before they go their separate ways. But the others are unprepared.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Sex toy tester Hayley wants the perfect partner to get her buzzing. And tree surgeon Dmitri is in for a big shock.

programme.title: Gogglebox Festive Special
programme.desc: Britain's favourite armchair critics review 2024's Christmas TV, from Strictly to Gavin & Stacey, First Dates, Hot Frosty, Bullseye, The Dog House, Is It Cake? and Fanny Cradock.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A Stereotypical Day: Jay goes out of his way to make a good impression on the new neighbours.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Blindsided: The Dunphys and Pritchetts go head-to-head when Luke decides his best chance of getting into college is to run against Manny in the senior class president election.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Conjugal Configuration: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground, while Penny and Leonard discover that they are uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Wedding Gift Wormhole: A stressed Sheldon and Amy struggle to work out what the 'perfect gift' is that Leonard and Penny gave them on their wedding day.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Springfield Summer Christmas for Christmas: A cable channel films a Christmas movie in Springfield, and Skinner falls in love.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Manger Things: A secret from Flanders' past is revealed, and we discover a room in the Simpsons' home that we've never seen before.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip from Rude Tube's naughty little sister Rude(ish) Tube, featuring sheep.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Fleming: Gordon Ramsay visits Fleming, a Danish restaurant in Miami. It was once the best family-run restaurant in town but is now losing money fast.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Sushi Ko: Akira and Lisa are losing up to $20,000 a month at their sushi restaurant in California. Can Gordon piece the family back together and save the restaurant?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Thanksgiving Decoupling: Howard takes the gang to his mother's house for Thanksgiving to protect himself from his grumpy father-in-law who has also been invited.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Discovery Dissipation: Sheldon feels guilty when he gets attention for his accidental discovery of a new element. Raj stays with Howard and Bernadette for a week.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cooper Extraction: Sheldon has to go back to Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he's away, the gang gather at the flat to decorate the Christmas tree.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hesitation Ramification: Penny's big TV acting break hits the cutting-room floor, so Leonard does his best to comfort her, which leads her to ask him a bold question.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: (2020) Madcap adventure-comedy video game adaptation with Jim Carrey and Ben Schwartz. Can nippy ring-chasing hedgehog Sonic escape the clutches of an evil, moustachioed scientist?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Sales Call Sublimation: Penny gets more than she bargained for when Leonard meets a psychiatrist, while Sheldon and Raj make an astronomical discovery.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Empathy Optimization: The gang plan a Sheldon-free weekend in Las Vegas after coping with his constant demands, rudeness and ingratitude when he was ill.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Meemaw Materialization: Sheldon is thrilled when his beloved grandma 'Meemaw' comes to visit, but his excitement fades when she butts heads with Amy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Valentino Submergence: Sheldon and Amy host a special live Valentine's Day episode of their internet show Fun with Flags. Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Positive Negative Reaction: When Bernadette makes a big announcement, Howard becomes convinced that he needs to start earning more money.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Celebration Experimentation: The gang persuade Sheldon to celebrate his birthday and invite a few special guests along to his party, in the 200th episode.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Application Deterioration: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard run into problems when they file for a patent. Emily reaches out to Raj after their break-up.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: (1996) Blockbusting landmark sci-fi action-thriller starring Will Smith and Jeff Goldblum. A US Air Force pilot and a scientist battle aliens who are spectacularly destroying our planet.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celebrities watch: This Morning, Dating Around, Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, Hostile Planet, Big Brother: Best Shows Ever, EastEnders and The Repair Shop.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celebrities watch 127 Hours, Planet Earth II, Cape Fear, This Morning on public toilets, EastEnders, Bradley Walsh & Son: Breaking Dad, and BBC News on beaches.

programme.title: Mrs Harris Goes to Paris
programme.desc: (2022) Lesley Manville stars as a cleaner who saves up and heads to Paris to get herself a Dior couture dress, in director Anthony Fabian's fabulous, Oscar-nominated period comedy drama.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: (2022) Gothic horror with Nathalie Emmanuel. A struggling New York artist discovers she has rich British relatives and accepts an invitation to a wedding in Whitby. Well, blood is blood.

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: (2008) Outrageous comedy with Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly. When two 40-year-old man-children's parents marry, can the lads settle their differences and grow up? Strong language/nudity.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1956) Historical drama. The Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman stars as an amnesiac refugee who Yul Brynner tries to pass off as the daughter of the murdered Tsar of Russia, Nicholas II.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: (1984) It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: (2006) Comedy-drama starring Anne Hathaway and Meryl Streep. A naive young woman lands a job as assistant to one of New York's most important, but ruthless and cynical, magazine editors.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: (2014) Thriller. Denzel Washington stars as an ex-soldier who comes out of retirement to help a teenage sex worker who's been assaulted by her pimp.

programme.title: Three Billboards Outside...
programme.desc: ...Ebbing, Missouri: (2017) Oscar-winning dark comedy about a mother who wants the cops to solve her daughter's murder using three precisely worded billboards. Starring Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: (1987) Award-winning comedy-drama set in an English seaside town in the early 1950s. Emily Lloyd stars as a spirited teenager whose sexual awakening comes at a price. With Tom Bell.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Lavender Hill Mob
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing comedy starring Alec Guinness as a mild-mannered bank clerk who assembles a gang to hijack a million quid's worth of gold. Which is when their problems really start...

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: (2011) Family comedy. Jim Carrey stars as a work-obsessed New York property developer whose life is turned upside down when he receives a crate containing six live penguins.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: (2006) Comedy. Neighbours Matthew Broderick and Danny DeVito get extremely competitive as they festoon their houses with increasingly outrageous festive decorations and lights.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: (1993) Romantic comedy with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan. A bereaved man gets another chance at love when his son puts him on a radio talk show.

programme.title: Moonfall
programme.desc: (2022) Sci-fi disaster with Halle Berry. A NASA bigwig, a disgraced astronaut and a conspiracy theorist are all that stand between the Earth and a plummeting Moon. But are aliens involved?

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead...
programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the cocaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.

programme.desc: (2019) Greta Gerwig's Oscar-winning period drama adaptation of the classic Louisa May Alcott novel, starring Emma Watson, Saoirse Ronan, Florence Pugh, Timothe Chalamet and Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: (2018) Nautical action thriller. Gerard Butler stars as an unconventional submarine skipper sent to investigate the torpedoing of a US vessel. With Gary Oldman, Linda Cardellini and Common.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: New: Christmas Carols on ITV 2025
programme.desc: Myleene Klass hosts a traditional Christmas Eve celebration from St Elisabeth's Church in Greater Manchester featuring performances by Catherine Tyldesley, Shayne Ward and more.

programme.title: Steve Backshall's Royal Arctic Challenge
programme.desc: Environmentalist Steve Backshall retraces Prince Charles' Arctic adventure in 1975 and uncovers dramatic changes to our planet with an urgent need for action.

programme.title: Gallagher PREM Unleashed
programme.desc: Action from the seventh round of fixtures of the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM Rugby season featuring Leicester v Gloucester, Saracens v Exeter, Harlequins v Bristol and Newcastle v Bath.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Classic fantasy drama film starring James Stewart and Donna Reed, 1946. A heavenly angel shows a frustrated businessman what life would have been like if he had never been born.

programme.title: Royal Carols: Together at Christmas
programme.desc: HRH The Princess of Wales hosts a special Christmas carol service at Westminster Abbey with festive musical performances, touching readings, and inspiringly warm films.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Happy Christmas! Kate is reunited with her Celebrity Traitors co-stars Sir Stephen Fry, Mark Bonnar and Jonathan Ross as we set the trio a festive mission in our Christmas quiz.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

programme.title: New: James Martin's Christmas Day
programme.desc: It's Christmas Day 2025 down in Hampshire, and James is spending the big day with guests including former supermodel Jodie Kidd and presenter and Loose Women star Gloria Hunniford.

programme.title: HM The King
programme.desc: His Majesty King Charles III delivers his annual Christmas message to the nation and the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Classic multi-Oscar-winning action-adventure film starring Harrison Ford and Karen Allen, 1981. An American archaeologist is tasked with finding the legendary Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

programme.title: New: It'll Be Alright on the Night
programme.desc: Tom Allen celebrates funny cock-ups from the world of entertainment featuring Idris Elba, Paul Rudd, Ant and Dec, Susanna Reid, Alan Carr and many more of our favourite stars.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: It is Christmas morning - as the villagers gather for mulled wine, Kim prepares to be alone while Charity is worried that Vanessa might blab on Christmas Day.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Secret Santa Maggie ensures that the Driscolls do not have themselves a merry little Christmas, Lisa receives a troubling update from Roy, and Carl tempts James to a festive fling.

programme.title: New: Bullseye Christmas Special
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff hosts a festive special of the classic darts-based game show and is joined by former world champion 'Mighty' Michael van Gerwen for a charity challenge.

programme.title: New: The 1% Club Christmas Special
programme.desc: Lee Mack hosts a festive special where every question is seasonally themed and 100 contestants hope to make the holiday season even more special by winning up to 100,000 pounds.

programme.title: New: Romesh Ranganathan's...
programme.desc: ...Parents' Evening: Christmas Special. Romesh Ranganathan hosts a festive special as famous faces Josh Widdicombe, Motsi Mabusi, and Larry and George Lamb compete for charity.

programme.title: Red One
programme.desc: Festive action-adventure comedy film starring Dwayne Johnson and Chris Evans, 2024. The North Pole's head of security teams up with a notorious hacker in order to save Christmas.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Festive romantic comedy film featuring an all-star cast, 2003. A story about the love lives of eight loosely interrelated couples as they head into the run-up to Christmas.

programme.title: The Royal Variety Performance 2025

programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Fletchers' Family Farm
programme.desc: Documentary series. The family finally move back onto the farm after months of hard work, and the barn is transformed for a wedding to remember and a heart-warming seasonal close.

programme.title: Love Your Christmas with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan at Manor Farm for this festive foray are the cast of Call the Midwife, Endeavour star Roger Allam, Tom Chambers and Christmas music from Lee Mead.

programme.title: James Martin's Christmas Day
programme.desc: It's Christmas Day 2025 down in Hampshire, and James is spending the big day with guests including former supermodel Jodie Kidd and presenter and Loose Women star Gloria Hunniford.

programme.title: Shrek
